title: iPhone Fitness Ad Features 1960s 'Chicken Fat' Song
teaser: The new ad uses the "Chicken Fat" song that was the anthem of gym classes everywhere in the early 1960s.
contentencoded:
[Youtube]

A new Apple TV ad promoting the physical fitness uses of the iPhone uses the “Chicken Fat” song that was the anthem of gym classes everywhere in the early 1960s.

Here & Now’s Robin Young explains the history of the song, which was President John F. Kennedy’s theme for his youth fitness program.
